When creating JIRA tickets, use this format:

```
**Title**: As a [role], I want to [action] so that [benefit]

**Description**: 2-3 sentences explaining what needs to be done and why it matters (not how to implement it)

**Mockups/Screenshots**: Include visual references for UI-related work

**API Spec/Technical details**: Include Open API reqruiements or other relevant technical details

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- Bullet list of specific, testable conditions that define "done"
- Use Given/When/Then format where applicable

**Priority**: Brief explanation of why this matters or how it fits the bigger goal

**Dependencies**: List any related tasks, blockers, or epics

**Estimate**: Story points or time estimate for effort sizing

**Reporter**

**Comments**

~``
